languages.text: Охота не просто приносит ценные ресурсы, но и становится настоящим событием для изголодавшейся по развлечениям команды. Право спуститься на планету и поучаствовать в действе продают, разыгрывают в карты и даже выбивают в кулачных состязаниях.

traits.locale_text: Охота не просто приносит ценные ресурсы, но и становится настоящим событием для изголодавшейся по развлечениям команды. Право спуститься на планету и поучаствовать в действе продают, разыгрывают в карты и даже выбивают в кулачных состязаниях.

languages.text: The great hunt brings plentiful spoils and lifts the crew's spirits. The right to take shore leave and partake in the hunt is so coveted a prize that many are willing to sell their belongings, make hefty bets in card games, and even fight in improvised tournaments to win it.
languages.original_text: Охота не просто приносит ценные ресурсы, но и становится настоящим событием для изголодавшейся по развлечениям команды. Право спуститься на планету и поучаствовать в действе продают, разыгрывают в карты и даже выбивают в кулачных состязаниях.

traits.locale_text: The great hunt brings plentiful spoils and lifts the crew's spirits. The right to take a shore leave and partake in the hunt is a coveted prize. To win it, many are willing to sell their belongings, make bets in card games and even fight in improvised tournaments.

The great hunt brings plentiful spoils and lifts the crew's spirits. The right to take a shore leave and partake in the hunt is a coveted prize. To win it, many are willing to sell their belongings, make bets in card games and even fight in improvised tournaments.

The great hunt brings plentiful spoils and lifts the crew's spirits. The right to take shore leave and partake in the hunt is so coveted a prize that many are willing to sell their belongings, make hefty bets in card games, and even fight in improvised tournaments to win it.

The great hunt brings plentiful spoils and lifts the crew's spirits. The right to take shore leave and partake in the hunt is so coveted a prize that many are willing to sell their belongings, make hefty bets in card games, and even fight in improvised tournaments to win it.

The great hunt brings plentiful spoils and lifts the crew's spirits. The right to take shore leave and partake in the hunt is so coveted a prize that many are willing to sell their belongings, make hefty bets in card games, and even fight in improvised tournaments to win it.

languages.text: 这场大型狩猎带来了丰厚的战利品，船员们的精神也为之一振。所有人都渴望赢得上岸休假与参加狩猎的权利。许多人变卖了他们的财产，在扑克游戏中下重注，甚至举行临时的锦标赛，以求赢得这样的权利。
languages.original_text: The great hunt brings plentiful spoils and lifts the crew's spirits. The right to take shore leave and partake in the hunt is so coveted a prize that many are willing to sell their belongings, make hefty bets in card games, and even fight in improvised tournaments to win it.

traits.locale_text: 这场大型狩猎带来了丰厚的战利品，船员们的精神也为之一振。所有人都渴望赢得上岸休假与参加狩猎的权利。许多人变卖了他们的财产，在扑克游戏中下重注，甚至举行临时的锦标赛，以求赢得这样的权利。

languages.text: La gran cacería trae un gran botín y mejora el ánimo de la tripulación. El permiso para bajar a tierra y participar en la cacería es tan preciado que muchos están dispuestos a vender sus pertenencias, hacer grandes apuestas en juegos de cartas e incluso luchar en torneos improvisados para obtenerlo.
languages.original_text: The great hunt brings plentiful spoils and lifts the crew's spirits. The right to take shore leave and partake in the hunt is so coveted a prize that many are willing to sell their belongings, make hefty bets in card games, and even fight in improvised tournaments to win it.

traits.locale_text: La gran cacería trae un gran botín y mejora el ánimo de la tripulación. El permiso para bajar a tierra y participar en la cacería es tan preciado que muchos están dispuestos a vender sus pertenencias, hacer grandes apuestas en juegos de cartas e incluso luchar en torneos improvisados para obtenerlo.

languages.text: 大狩猟は多くの戦利品をもたらし、クルーの士気を高める。寄港地での休暇を取り狩猟に参加するのは誰しもが望むところで、そのために所持品を売ったり、カードゲームで高額な賭けをしたり、即席の大会で戦ったりすることも厭わない者も多い。
languages.original_text: The great hunt brings plentiful spoils and lifts the crew's spirits. The right to take shore leave and partake in the hunt is so coveted a prize that many are willing to sell their belongings, make hefty bets in card games, and even fight in improvised tournaments to win it.

traits.locale_text: 大狩猟は多くの戦利品をもたらし、クルーの士気を高める。寄港地での休暇を取り狩猟に参加するのは誰しもが望むところで、そのために所持品を売ったり、カードゲームで高額な賭けをしたり、即席の大会で戦ったりすることも厭わない者も多い。

languages.text: Die große Jagd bringt reichlich Beute und hebt die Laune der Crew. Das Recht auf Landgang und auf die Teilnahme an der Jagd ist derart begehrt, dass viele bereit sind, dafür ihr Eigentum zu verkaufen, in Kartenspielen große Einsätze zu machen und sogar in improvisierten Turnieren darum zu kämpfen.
languages.original_text: The great hunt brings plentiful spoils and lifts the crew's spirits. The right to take shore leave and partake in the hunt is so coveted a prize that many are willing to sell their belongings, make hefty bets in card games, and even fight in improvised tournaments to win it.

traits.locale_text: Die große Jagd bringt reichlich Beute und hebt die Laune der Crew. Das Recht auf Landgang und auf die Teilnahme an der Jagd ist derart begehrt, dass viele bereit sind, dafür ihr Eigentum zu verkaufen, in Kartenspielen große Einsätze zu machen und sogar in improvisierten Turnieren darum zu kämpfen.

languages.text: La grande chasse rapporte de nombreuses ressources et augmente le moral de l'équipage. La permission de descendre à terre et de participer à la chasse est si convoitée que de nombreux membres de l'équipages vendent leurs affaires, parient leur argent aux cartes et vont jusqu'à se battre lors de tournois improvisés pour pouvoir en profiter.
languages.original_text: The great hunt brings plentiful spoils and lifts the crew's spirits. The right to take shore leave and partake in the hunt is so coveted a prize that many are willing to sell their belongings, make hefty bets in card games, and even fight in improvised tournaments to win it.

La permission de descendre à terre et de participer à la chasse est si convoitée que de nombreux membres de l'équipages vendent leurs affaires, parient leur argent aux cartes et vont jusqu'à se battre lors de tournois improvisés pour pouvoir en profiter.
